pages.title: Three Modes
pages.text: Your companion has three behavior modes:$(br2)$(bold)FOLLOW$() — Follows you around. Teleports if too far away.$(br2)$(bold)STAY$() — Stands still at their current position.$(br2)$(bold)AUTO$() — Autonomously performs tasks: farming, logistics, wandering, and combat.

pages.title: Switching Modes
pages.text: Use these methods to change modes:$(br2)$(li)Quick commands: $(thing)!follow$(), $(thing)!stay$(), $(thing)!auto$()$(li)Chat with the AI: "Switch to follow mode"$(li)The HUD overlay shows the current mode as a colored badge.
